reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 368: ELECTION OF SURVIVING SPOUSE

content.content: 1. An election made under section 6 of the Act shall be in Form 1, titled “Election of Surviving Spouse”, dated April 10, 2017 and available on the Internet through www.ontariocourtforms.on.ca.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 368, s. 1; O. Reg. 150/17, s. 1. Form 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 150/17, s. 2.  Français
content.raw_html:
1. An election made under section 6 of the Act shall be in Form 1, titled “Election of Surviving Spouse”, dated April 10, 2017 and available on the Internet through www.ontariocourtforms.on.ca.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 368, s. 1; O. Reg. 150/17, s. 1.

Form 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 150/17, s. 2.

 

Français
